name: Stockholm Syndrome
description:
We are a group of students at Valla Game Education class of 2020 (Sweden, Linköping).
This game was made as a final project for our Unreal Engine course.
Made during one and a half month in Unreal Engine 4.

Developers:

Benjamin Larsson
Carl Linné
Elias Flood
Josua Mannebäck 
Philip Bergljung
